attributes.action: Prevent the Kennel Club from setting breed standards for Jack Russell Terriers
attributes.background:
For over 100 years the Kennel Club has refused to recognise the Jack Russell Terrier as a pedigree breed. Now it has decided to change this policy.
We feel that setting breed standards for such a healthy breed will lead to interbreeding and destroy the character of the Jack Russell Terier.

rejection.details: The decisions of the Kennel Club are not the responsibility of the Government or Parliament. You could write directly to the Kennel Club to raise this issue.
